English: Good morning, my dear. I truly never thought I’d live to see this place open its doors again.
Sorry, do I know you?
Pardon my excitement - I was so delighted that I forgot to introduce myself. My name is Caterina De Luca. I was your grandmother’s dearest friend. May she rest in peace.
What do you mean? You don’t look old at all.
You really think so? Well, thank you — you've managed to make this old lady’s heart beat a little faster. But let me tell you something: this pot doesn’t cook for inexperienced chefs.
Not in a good mood.. Can we talk later?

Let me see if I got this straight — you expect me, a woman this beautiful and busy, to wait until the little boy feels ready to talk? Boy, if I still needed permission to speak, I’d be betraying everything I’ve fought for. Get yourself together.
Now tell me, young one — what is your name?
Max Malvezzi.
Alessandro Malvezzi.
Livia Malvezzi.
What a beautiful name you own, my dear.
Let's see if you got your grandmother's blood. Prepare me a passion meal, i'm feeling <color=#69F580>romantic</color>.
Hey, sir. How are you doing today?
Hmph. That’s the kind of question young people ask when they don’t really care about the answer. You wouldn’t understand anyway.
Try me. I’ve seen my share of tough days.

…Heh. You’ve got guts, I’ll give you that.
Name’s Carlito.
Fifty-three years old and already yesterday’s news. 
Wife left last month. Took the dog, too. Turns out even that mutt couldn’t stand me anymore.
Funny, isn’t it? They say time heals. Guess mine just ran out.
I'm sorry to hear that. Do you want to talk about it?
Fine. If you don’t wanna talk, that’s your problem.
I was just trying to be polite…
